title: Update show-heartbeat documentation
body:
The [`show-heartbeat` documentation](http://normandy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user/actions/show-heartbeat.html) is out-of-date with recent additions (such as the 24-hour delay between showing individual Heartbeat prompts. We should update it.

@andymikulski You're most familiar with the new options we've added to `show-heartbeat`, I imagine you're the best person for this issue, though it's not urgent or anything.
